content: RPS Club is a platform for tournament version of the well-known game Rock-Paper-Scissors with unique rules that force participants to find balance between luck, strategy, trust and deception to get a bold win and to secure higher win rate in the long run for regular players.The game of Rock-Paper-Scissors is known to everyone yet to play it as it is in a tournament format may sound fun just for a few rounds. To add more room for strategies and deceptive manoeuvres we introduced unique rules that wonâ€™t leave you without full spectre of emotions - from confusion to eureka, from sweet victory with new reliable friend to bitter betrayal.Every week our players win HUNDREDS usdtðŸ’µ competing in our tournaments FOR FREE. Wanna be part of it?Provably FairWe provide absolute transparency on each and every transaction by operating fully on blockchain.Sensitive information, specifically when user sends his move is encoded and is being decoded only after second playerâ€™s turn. Play 2 EarnTo attract wide range of players and to give a ground to try out and improve your strategies we offer Play To Earn mode where one should pass daily qualifiers to attend Weekly and Monthly tournaments with real prizes.Every day we hold two tournaments with free entry for whitelisted players.WEBSITE: https://rpsclub.com/DOCS PAGE: https://rpsclub.com/docs_enWHITELIST CONTEST (Gleam, totally free): https://rpsclub.com/whitelistGAMEPLAY VIDEO:  https://youtu.be/5xO3HaNotjsTWITTER/X:  https://twitter.com/RpsClub2023Interesting part (Earn for free!)RPS Club is at the very beginning. We need audience. So our tournaments are free to enroll but the prize fund IS REAL (usdt).Club RPS offers P2E mode - a chance for every single player to share the prize pool in the series of consequent free-to-play tournaments. You can find them under Scheduled tab.Every month RPS Club holds free tournaments with a total of 900 USDT prize pool in Monthly and four Weekly tournaments.To register for Monthly tournament one should have two golden tickets.Every week on Sunday Weekly tournaments are being held with- 100 USDT Prize Pool- Golden Tickets To register for Weekly tournament one should have three silver tickets.Every day two Daily tournaments with free entry are being held with silver ticket as a prize for all winners.Only players from whitelist are allowed for registration. Please apply here: https://rpsclub.com/whitelistA list of tournaments is here: https://rpsclub.com/
